title: Review completed
body: Review completed!

title: Booking completed
body: The booking has been succesfull!

title: Request sent
body: Your request has been sent!

title: Privacy Policy
body: Add Privacy policy

title: Terms of Service
body: Add Terms of Service

title: Welcome email
body:
Hello!


To complete your sign-up please open the following link:


<%-VERIFICATION_LINK%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: New request received
body:
Hello!


You have received a new request for your listing. Respond here:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Listing has been cancelled
body:
Hello!

Your listing '<%- LISTING_TITLE %>' has been cancelled.


You can create a new listing here: '<%- ACTION_URL %>'


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: New task
body:
Check out the new task here:

<%- ACTION_URL %>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: New request sent
body:
Hello!


You have sent a request for the listing


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Your request has been declined
body:
Hello!


Your application has been cancelled. Possible reasons may be:

  • Task owner has choosen someone else for the job
  • The job has been cancelled


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Your request has been cancelled
body:
Hello!


You have cancelled your request for a listing your applied for. Apply for other listings here:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Request for your task has been cancelled
body:
Hello!


Order request has been cancelled.


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Your task has been marked as spam
body:
Hello!


Your task has been marked as spam.



Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: You have been blocked!
body:
Hello!


You have been blocked from the platform. In case of questions, please contact support.



Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Request has been accepted
body:
Hello!


Your request has been accepted. Visit your dashboard to see more information


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: You marked the task as done
body:
Hello!


You have marked the task as done. See more information on your dashboard:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Assignment has been completed
body:
Hello!


The order has been completed. See more information on your dashboard:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Order confirmed
body:
Hello!


You have successfully created an order. See more information on your dashboard:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Order has been marked as done
body:
Hello!


The order has been marked as done. See more information on your dashboard:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Order has been completed
body:
Hello!


The order has been completed. See more information on your dashboard:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: New message
body:
Hello!


<%-SENDER_FIRST_NAME%> <%-SENDER_LAST_NAME%> sent you a message regarding the listing '<%-LISTING_TITLE%>'. See more information:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: New review
body:
Hello!


You have a new review. See more:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: You closed the booking
body:
Hello!


You closed the booking

You can leave review here:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Your task has been closed
body:
Hello!


The task you are assigned to, has been closed.


You can leave review here:

<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team

title: Password reset
body:
Hello!


With the following link you can reset your password:


<%-ACTION_URL%>


Best regards,

<%- CONFIG.NAME %> team
